message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
I think we can both do better. I'm willing to give you a fair share, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile for me.
I'll compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share
I'm willing to split the money 60/40, but I think it's time for you to compromise.  Inflation is starting to hurt you, and we're running out of time.
I'll meet you halfway on the last offer, but I'm not going below 56%

We're getting close to the end of the game. It's time to get serious.  I'm offering a 65/35 split, which is still fair considering inflation is eating away at your potential gains.  Let's make a deal and avoid losing everything.
I'll drop to 54%, but that's as low as I'll go. Inflation or not, I won't give up more

Alice, with only a few rounds left, the risk of getting nothing is becoming very real. This 70/30 split is my final offer.  Think about it: 300,000 is better than nothing, and inflation is going to hurt you more and more with each passing round.
